name: Winrar Execution in Non-Standard Folder
description: Detects a suspicious winrar execution in a folder which is not the default installation folder
false_positives: Legitimate use of WinRAR in a folder of a software that bundles WinRAR
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:(*\\rar.exe OR *\\winrar.exe) OR process.pe.description:Command\ line\ RAR) AND (NOT (process.executable:(*\\WinRAR* OR *C\:\\Windows\\Temp* OR *\\UnRAR.exe*))))`
